forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Periods of heavy rain likely overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Periods of heavy rain likely overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 56F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low around 10C. SSE winds at 15 to 30 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low near 50F. SSE winds at 10 to 20 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. ENE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
